ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Sodankylä Geophysical Observatory VLF Receiver System
ResourceHeader.Description:
The broadband (500Hz-38kHz) VLF receivers support the observing campaigns at SGO as well as supporting other VLF networks including AARDDVARK (Antarctic-Arctic Radiation belt (Dynamic) Deposition -
VLF Atmospheric Research Konsortia), WWLLN (World Wide Lightning
Location Network) and AWDA (Automatic Whistler Detector and Analyzer) .
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
NOTE: SGO data are available free of charge for
   scientific and educational purposes. If the data are used for
   scientific publications, the SGO requires you to contact them in order to
   discuss under which conditions these data can be published,
   i.e. whether an acknowledgment of the Sodankylä Geophysical
   Observatory in your paper is sufficient or whether SGO requires
   co-authorship. For detailed access to additional data, please
   contact the SGO office or the observer in charge.
   
   See the detailed data license, https://www.sgo.fi/Data/licence.php

Instrument.InvestigationName: VLF Measurements at Sodankylä Geophysical Observatory
